Research

{% endblock headers %} {% block content %}

Welcome to the HomePage of the GeCo GeDi Project.
Its aim is to collect the contributions of the several research groups in subjects related to Geometry.

We want to emphasize that this project is open to everybody whose research interests are close to Geometry and related subjects.
Please, feel free to navigate among the pages of the server, to download all the material you are interested in, and to contribute actively by keeping update the various sections.
If you want to receive regularly the group news subscribe to our mailing lists in the mail section.
